helpDescription: Change settings for when users leave the guild.
helpUsage: Change setting for exp to be cleared upon user leaving.```/goodbye clear <on/off>```
typeSuccess: Goodbye messages will now be sent to **%s**.
typeDisabled: Goodbye messages have been set to **off**.
clearSuccess: Member experience %s be cleared upon leaving the server.
messageDefault: Goodbye message has been reset back to basic message.
messageTooLong: Max character count is 1250, you are over the count by **%s**.
messageSuccess: Goodbye message has been updated to:```%s```
pingIncorrect: Enable/disable pings for goodbye messages.```/announce ping <on/off>```
pingSuccess: Goodbye pings have been set to **%s**.
typeDefault: Goodbye will now appear in the **channel the user levels up in**.
typeReward: Goodbye will only be sent on levels which **reward** members.
typeInvalidChannel: Sets where goodbye messages are sent.```/announce type <default/dm/off/reward/#channel>```
typeChannelSuccess: Goodbye channel has been set to **%s**.
embedColorIncorrect: Given color is not a valid hex color (#6CFFAC).
embedColorSuccess: Embed color for goodbye has been updated to **%s**.
titleTooLong: Max character count is 256 for title, you are over the count by **%s**.
titleSuccess: Goodbye title has been updated to:```%s```
imageIncorrect: Given link is not an image, please provide a valid image link. Image types currently supported: jpg|jpeg|png|gif.
imageSuccess:
Goodbye embed image has been updated to %s

By continuing you understand the image you are uploading follows the **[Discord's Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms)**. Anything that is uploaded is your responsibility and you will be held accountable for it.
